formatted_address: 2 Central Blvd #02-04 IOI, Central Blvd, Towers, Singapore 018916
name: Guerilla Coffee @ IOI Central Boulevard Towers

reviews.text:
Found the hidden gem! Cafe located near raffles place.
Although it’s located at the office building, the place was quite spacious with a several tables. They are having monday 1 for 1 promotion for mocha (promotion code: MMOCHA).
Mocha was very nice (sweet chocolate taste) ☕️ would like to try other drinks too :)

Didn’t try the food or desserts as just came for the coffee. But the paninis priced at mostly $6, looked affordable. The mocha large was quite pricy but it’s good! Was quite empty on a Thursday noon time.
Expensive coffee shop at CBD! However we got this 1-for-1 mocha offer on Monday! $4 / cup for a good mocha, cheers! Order is self service on a machine, and the seating area is quite small.

Hidden gem as it’s located at a corner of the office tower. Pretty spacious as there are quite a number of tables. Love the decor as well.

Orders have to be made on the self service kiosk and the kiosk allows for receipts to be sent digitally, which is especially useful for work expenses.
Coffee is okay. But they should check their disposable cups and lids, whether the lid fits and is secure. For two times buying from them in a week, the coffee or tea spilled.

vicinity: 2 Central Blvd #02-04 IOI, Central Boulevard, Towers
